forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. North wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle cloud cover drapes the skyline, the world still waking beneath the cooler embrace of the night. The waters beyond whisper of a soft marine layer, hinting at the interplay between land and sea, with fog poised to linger in the corners of the Bay. Though temperatures are set to hover in the low fifties throughout the day, the bite of the morning air might compel a cardigan or light jacket, allowing you to walk with ease as the chill gives way to mild afternoon warmth.

When the sun asserts its presence, expect moments of brilliance as the clouds part, allowing for glimpses of blue against the city’s iconic architecture. The calm northeasterly winds, barely ruffling the lightest of fabrics, promise a serene stroll—ideal for wandering through the quieter streets or perhaps stopping by a fragrant café for a warm cup of coffee. Encounters with art galleries or small bookstores might also paint your day with inspiration. Embrace the day—while not vibrantly sunny, it offers a pleasant coexistence of cool and clarity, a quintessential San Francisco walk, enriching both spirit and mind.
